level.text: The right or obligation, if any, to do business with the limited cooperative association; and
May be in certificated or uncertificated form.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 29-1001.02.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on ยง 601 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
